The Hall of Fame:

My idea would involve an extra building, either around or near the training center.

In this building we would have, in a timeline like fashion, the first Kerbal to ever do Ã¢â‚¬Å“xÃ¢â‚¬Â. Such as the first Kerbal to orbit Minimus, the first flyby of the sun, the first Kerbal to get home safe, etc.

And perhaps along with the mission specs:

*Mission Name

*Rocket Type Used

*What it may have docked with

*How long it took to leave KerbinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s influence

I apologize if this would go under the category of landmark, or even cemetery.

Nice idea, but why not instead of creating a new building, simply expanding the astronaut facility to display more stats?

for either Living or lost kerbals there would be a Story\timeline like u described attached

Museum / Hall of Fame newspaper, it has already been suggestion lot and lot of times.

Please use the search function of the forum to avoid duplicating the same suggestion over and over.
